4.text: Ten years ago you needed a swanky office address

7.text: to be taken seriously as a start-up.

9.text: But those days are over. In this era of flexible working and digital nomads,

14.text: entrepreneurs can run their ventures from almost anywhere.

17.text: But which work spaces represent the best value for money?

20.text: In this episode, we'll look at the cheapest options for the budding entrepreneur.

26.text: There are quite a few advantages to working from home

28.text: and not just because you can stay in your pajamas all day.

31.text: If you run your start-up from your kitchen table,

34.text: you can claim back a proportion of your rent and utility bills

37.text: as expenses each year. Just be careful about creating a dedicated home office

41.text: as you may have to pay business rates on the property.

46.text: If you think working at home will be too distracting or too lonely,

49.text: you might want to consider co-working. There are loads of different options

52.text: from national players like Regus to smaller independent outfits like WeWork.

56.text: The options are usually well sign posted online,

59.text: but it can be tricky to find cheap or free options without doing a little digging.

63.text: Remember to check for the basics like free wifi and free tea or coffee.

69.text: It's possible to work in all sorts of places across the UK

72.text: for no more than the cost of a coffee or a sandwich.

74.text: Many cafes, bars, restaurants, and art or event spaces

78.text: offer free wifi. And different places have different busy periods.

81.text: So if you do your homework you can create your own timetable

83.text: of spaces and hop between them to avoid the crush.

86.text: For example, the art gallery in the morning, bar in the afternoon,

89.text: and a coffee shop in the evening.

93.text: Sofia in Bulgaria was recently hailed as one of the best places to launch a start-up

98.text: because it has one of the lowest income tax rates in the world

101.text: and also one of the fastest internet speeds.

103.text: Other local cities include Cairo, Bangalore, Tunisia, and Kuala Lumpur.

108.text: These days, not having an office should not hold you back.

111.text: Just make sure you work out what works for you and your business.
